currencyCode.description: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the price.

priceOffers.description: Description and identifier for combined service pricing, e.g. hotel price includes flight fare: 'HOTEL', 'JOURNEY', 'CAR'

averageDailyPrice.description: The average daily price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

averageDailyPriceUSD.description: The average daily price for the reservation or ticket in USD, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

totalPriceUSD.description: The total price for the reservation or ticket in USD, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

totalTaxUSD.description: The total tax for the reservation or ticket in USD

pricingGroupId.description: A unique identifier for price market combining ISO codes for currency and country
